## Description

A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

A clear and concise description of what actually happened.

## Screenshots

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

## Environment

Please complete the following information:

- [ ] Chrome Version: [e.g., 120.0.6099.109]
- [ ] OS: [e.g., Windows 11, macOS Sonoma 14.2, Ubuntu 22.04]
- [ ] Extension Version: [e.g., 4.0.0]

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here. This could include:

- Console errors (right-click the extension popup > Inspect > Console tab)
- Network errors
- Any recent changes to your browser or system
- Whether this issue is reproducible consistently
